text: R4.8. Find PBN from extent-based file Consider a file system with 2048-byte blocks that uses the extent-based file representation. Assume that: Â« The file below contains many hundreds of blocks. o All numbers (including your answer) are in decimal. If the first physical block number of this file is 130, what is the physical block number of the logical block number 8?
